data.lyric:
[ti:Beer Can't Fix]
[ar:Thomas Rhett/Jon Pardi]
[al:Beer Can't Fix]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Beer Can't Fix - Thomas Rhett/Jon Pardi
[00:00.11]Lyrics by：Thomas Rhett/Julian Bunetta/Zach Skelton/Ryan Tedder
[00:00.24]Composed by：Thomas Rhett/Julian Bunetta/Zach Skelton/Ryan Tedder
[00:00.35]Thomas Rhett：
[00:00.36]You're all alone at a party you wanna dance with somebody
[00:04.45]But you ain't got a clue how to ask
[00:08.76]You and your girl had a fight and now she's sayin' goodbye
[00:13.16]She ran upstairs and packed her bags
[00:16.63]Thomas Rhett：
[00:17.42]It could be rainin' on your perfect vacation
[00:21.72]You could be stressed about your work situation
[00:26.01]Ain't gotta listen to me but all I'm sayin'
[00:29.49]Thomas Rhett：
[00:29.86]Ain't nothing that a beer can't fix
[00:33.97]Ain't no pain it can't wash away
[00:38.22]From the moment that it hits your lips
[00:42.51]Makes those clouds look a little less gray
[00:47.17]Oh you could be lonely or heartbroken
[00:52.07]Or hungover from the night before
[00:55.61]Turn that frown into a smile real quick
[00:59.65]There ain't nothing that a beer can't fix
[01:02.98]Jon Pardi：
[01:05.18]You're on a lake and you're fishin'
[01:07.29]It's hot and all that you're gettin' is a little nibble here and there
[01:13.73]You're sitttin' watchin' your team losin' that championship ring
[01:18.12]And you're feeling like life ain't fair
[01:21.31]Jon Pardi：
[01:22.31]It could be rainin' on your perfect vacation
[01:26.57]You could be stressed about your work situation
[01:29.88]Jon Pardi：
[01:30.15]Ain't nothing that a beer can't fix
[01:34.43]Ain't no pain it can't wash away
[01:38.76]From the moment that it hits your lips
[01:43.11]Makes those clouds look a little less gray
[01:47.31]Oh you could be lonely heartbroken
[01:52.77]Or hungover from the night before
[01:56.01]Turn that frown into a smile real quick
[02:00.46]Ain't nothing that a beer can't fix
[02:03.60]Yeehaw
[02:04.75]Thomas Rhett/Jon Pardi：
[02:22.83]It could be rainin' on your perfect vacation
[02:27.08]You could be stressed about your work situation
[02:31.29]Ain't gotta save it for no special occasion
[02:34.86]Thomas Rhett/Jon Pardi：
[02:35.46]Ain't nothing that a beer can't fix
[02:39.42]Ain't no pain it can't wash away no
[02:43.69]From the moment that it hits your lips
[02:47.92]Makes those clouds look a little less gray
[02:52.08]Oh you could be lonely
[02:54.61]Lonely
[02:55.46]Heartbroken
[02:56.53]Heartbroken
[02:57.61]Or hungover from the night before
[03:00.95]Turn that frown into a smile real quick
[03:04.18]So quick
[03:05.03]It might take one or it might take six
[03:09.66]Drink it down it will do the trick
[03:13.93]Ain't nothing that a beer can't fix
data.trans:
[ti:Beer Can’t Fix]
[ar:Thomas Rhett/Jon Pardi]
[al:Beer Can’t Fix]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.11]//
[00:00.24]//
[00:00.35]//
[00:00.36]在舞会上 你形单影只 想与人共舞
[00:04.45]你却不知如何开口
[00:08.76]你和女友大吵一架 她准备和你分手
[00:13.16]她气冲冲地跑上楼 收拾行李
[00:16.63]//
[00:17.42]再美好的假期 也会下雨
[00:21.72]你的工作也会让你倍感压力
[00:26.01]不管你听不听 我还是要说
[00:29.49]//
[00:29.86]一杯啤酒可以让难题迎刃而解
[00:33.97]让你忘却所有痛苦
[00:38.22]当它游走在你的唇齿之间
[00:42.51]眼前的世界仿佛明亮了起来
[00:47.17]有时 你感到孤独寂寞 或是心碎不已
[00:52.07]有时 你彻夜买醉 难以清醒
[00:55.61]此刻 紧锁着的眉头舒展开来 会心一笑
[00:59.65]一杯啤酒可以让难题迎刃而解
[01:02.98]//
[01:05.18]你坐在湖边钓鱼
[01:07.29]天气闷热 鱼儿不上钩 你一无所获
[01:13.73]你坐在观众席干着急 看着自己喜欢的队伍与桂冠失之交臂
[01:18.12]你感觉生活对你不公平
[01:21.31]//
[01:22.31]再美好的假期 也会下雨
[01:26.57]你的工作也会让你倍感压力
[01:29.88]//
[01:30.15]一杯啤酒可以让难题迎刃而解
[01:34.43]让你忘却所有痛苦
[01:38.76]当它游走在你的唇齿之间
[01:43.11]眼前的世界仿佛明亮了起来
[01:47.31]有时 你感到孤独寂寞 或是心碎不已
[01:52.77]有时 你彻夜买醉 难以清醒
[01:56.01]此刻 紧锁着的眉头舒展开来 会心一笑
[02:00.46]一杯啤酒可以让难题迎刃而解
[02:03.60]//
[02:04.75]//
[02:22.83]再美好的假期 也会下雨
[02:27.08]你的工作也会让你倍感压力
[02:31.29]不必忍耐 等到最佳场合
[02:34.86]//
[02:35.46]一杯啤酒可以让难题迎刃而解
[02:39.42]让你忘却所有痛苦
[02:43.69]当它游走在你的唇齿之间
[02:47.92]眼前的世界仿佛明亮了起来
[02:52.08]有时 你感到孤独寂寞
[02:54.61]孤独寂寞
[02:55.46]心碎不已
[02:56.53]心碎不已
[02:57.61]有时 你彻夜买醉 难以清醒
[03:00.95]此刻 紧锁着的眉头舒展开来 会心一笑
[03:04.18]快速转换
[03:05.03]可能需要一杯 也许需要多来几杯
[03:09.66]什么都别管 直接喝下去
[03:13.93]一杯啤酒可以让难题迎刃而解
